events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund immediately because this product is not what I ordered.
The system has classified the customer's request as related to a refund due to receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you have received the wrong item, and I am here to help you process your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and expedite your refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I have attached a photo showing that the item is not what I originally purchased.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days, and you may keep the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to keep the wrong item while still receiving a refund. Thank you for resolving this promptly.
The refund has been successfully processed and you should see the amount credited in your account shortly. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
We are following up to ensure you received the refund as promised and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since no further issues were reported, your case has been closed. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to make things right.
You will receive a short survey soon to rate your experience with our customer support for this refund request.
